description: I. Letter dated 16/07/2009 from Lord West of Spithead to Baroness Neville-Jones regarding newspaper surveillance methods and the security of the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency (DVLA) database. 2 p. II. Letter dated 16/07/2009 from Lord West of Spithead to Baroness Miller of Chilthorne Domer regarding newspaper surveillance methods and the maximum penalty available for knowingly or recklessly misusing personal data without the data controller's consent. 2 p.
